籤詩版本二:
Ua aʻo au i ka makani a me ka ua e hoʻi i ka home, akā ua like koʻu kino me ka ʻale
Paʻa wau i ka nio i koʻu waha a makemake wau e hana i kumu, akā ua haki ka hope o ke kumu a uhi ʻia ka ʻumiʻumi i ka lepo.
詩意:
Hōʻike kēia hexagram i ke kiʻi o kahi ʻāleʻa e paʻa ana i kahi Ni ma kona waha.
ʻO nā mea a pau he hana a hana.
解曰: ʻO nā ʻano hoʻopunipuni a pau. ʻAʻole pau ke kakahiaka a me ka pō. ʻO wai ka mea ʻike i kēia. Ma hope o nā mea a pau, he hana paʻakikī.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Ua kanu ʻo Dong Yong i kona makuakāne
ʻO Dong Yong o ka Mōʻī Han he kanaka ʻo Qiancheng. Ua ʻilihune kona ʻohana a ua nalowale kona makuahine i kona wā ʻōpiopio, no laila pono ʻo ia e kākoʻo i kona makuakāne wale nō.
I ka make ʻana o kona makuakāne, ʻaʻohe kālā iā Dong Yong e kanu iā ia, no laila ua ʻaiʻē ʻo ia i 10,000 yuan mai nā poʻe ʻē aʻe e kanu i kona makuakāne. I ka wā e hiki mai ana, inā ʻaʻohe aʻu kālā e hoʻihoʻi ai, e lilo au i kauā. I kēlā me kēia lā, pono lākou e kiʻi i hoʻokahi haʻawe wahie, ʻehā haʻawe wai, a ʻohi i ʻeono a ʻehiku mau ʻeka o nā mahina ʻai, he hana nui ia.
(He mea hoʻohālike kēia moʻolelo no ka hana ikaika, akā ʻaʻohe mea i koe.)
聖意: E pilikia mua ka hale, a laila e hiki mai ka maikaʻi, e makaʻala i ka ʻimi waiwai, ka ʻaelike, a me ka male, ʻo ke kanaka hele wāwae ʻo Yoshida Canli, ke ono o nā holoholona, ​​e loaʻa ka hoʻopiʻi lehulehu. a e hoʻopiʻi ʻia, ʻo ka neʻe ʻana, ka waiwai nalowale, ka maʻi, ka makemake i ka mauna a me ka lua kupapaʻu.
古人: Ua kanu ʻo Dong Yong i kona makuakāne
第X籤: ʻO ke kolu o ka hailona
